items.longDescription:
Introduction of Detective Conan (Case Closed)

After solving a case, high school detective Shinichi Kudo witnessed men dressed all in black engaging in suspicious activity. In an attempt to silence him, they force-fed him a mysterious drug that caused his body to shrink to that of a first grader. Gosho Aoyama's mystery manga "Detective Conan (Case Closed)", which began serialization in "Weekly Shonen Sunday" in 1994, is now a very popular manga with more than 100 volumes. This original design, featuring fan-favorite scenes from the original manga and art from the TV anime, is available only at UNIQLO.

©Gosho Aoyama/1996,2023 Shogakukan, YTV, TMS

items.longDescription:
One-point embroidery in neon colors and back prints evoke the 80’s and 90’s. A simple design with a pop edge.

Mickey Mouse x Keith Haring

Pay tribute to two artistic greats with this special design featuring Mickey Mouse and Keith Haring's iconic characters. Drawing inspiration from Disney's "how-to-draw" book, Haring's love of art and cartoons shines through in his distinctive style. This collection also includes a trendy, oversized T-shirt silhouette. Celebrate the intersection of two creative worlds with this must-have design.

Keith Haring
A key figure in New York’s East Village scene in the late 1970s and 80s, American artist Keith Haring’s artwork populated not only art galleries, but also the city’s subways, streets, and sidewalks. His work often combined an iconographic vocabulary, including hearts, flying saucers, winged figures, and a crawling “radiant baby,”with abstract marks and patterning.

Mickey Mouse character:TM & ©Disney.
Keith Haring artwork:© Keith Haring Foundation.

items.longDescription:
The Marvel Art Collection by Mondo

This t-shirt collection is developed in collaboration with Mondo, a pioneering art collective that has designed and created numerous original works of movie posters. We focused on their highly distinctive MARVEL artworks from their back catalogue, as it resulted in a totally unique collection of graphic t-shirts only available in UT.

Mondo
Based in Austin, Texas, U.S.A., Mondo creates high quality limited-edition posters, vinyl soundtracks, and premium collectible figures with talented artists from around the world. Over the last decade, Mondo has brought their passion for film, art, and music to partnerships with leading entertainment brands, international independent studios, and filmmakers.

© 2023 MARVEL

items.longDescription:
This “Toy Story” print features a mosaic created by Adam Lister. The characters and the iconic wallpaper from Andy’s room in the first “Toy Story” movie are reinterpreted as geometric pixel art.

PIXAR ART

Pixar Animation Studios has created such beloved films as “Toy Story” and “Monsters, Inc.,” which continue to be loved by people all over the world. UNIQLO has invited artists who love Pixar films to reinterpret the famous characters in their own distinct style.

Adam Lister
Adam Lister lives and works in Beacon, New York. Lister is a visual artist whose work consists of geometric interpretations of iconic imagery and pop culture references. Lister breaks down classic images to their most elemental forms by combining the deconstructed and minimal aesthetic of pixelated graphics with the transparency of watercolor paint and the flatness of acrylic paint.

©Disney/Pixar
©Disney

items.longDescription:
Mikasa, Armin, and Levi head to their final battle against Eren to stop the Rumbling. The design features an iconic scene in which Levi replies to Mikasa's words, "I'll do it, everyone cover me," as she resolves to kill her loved one. The scene from this epic battle is printed vibrantly on the back, while the "Wings of Freedom," the emblem that represents Survey Corps' freedom, is featured on the front of the T-shirt.

Attack on titan

The popular manga series written and illustrated by Hajime Isayama was serialized in “Bessatsu Shonen Magazine” from 2009 to 2021, the cumulative circulation has exceeded 110 million copies worldwide, and it continues to create shock waves not only in Japan but also around the world. These UT are inspired by this manga which captures the reader’s attention with a world where humanity is forced to live in cities surrounded by enormous “walls” that protect them from gigantic man-eating humanoids referred to as Titans, and “Vertical maneuvering equipment” developed to combat the Titans.

©Hajime Isayama / Kodansha Ltd.
items.name: Attack On Titan UT (Short Sleeve Graphic T-Shirt)
items.shortDescription: The TV anime “Attack on Titan” The Final Season.Humanity vs. Titans. A superb collection befitting the conclusion of this turbulent story.

A soldier asks if he was of no use to humanity in the fight against the Titans, as he draws his final breath. items.longDescription:
A frame of Power, the Blood Fiend, who is a member of the devil-hunting organization in the series called Public Safety Devil Hunters Tokyo Special Division 4, is layered with an original drawing of her beloved cat, Meowy. Accompanied by the graphic is her quote, “Only cats get along with me. I hate humans. Not because they did something to me. It’s more like a Devil’s instinct. I hate Devils just as much. That’s because they took away my Meowy.”

Chainsaw Man × Kosuke Kawamura

Chainsaw Man is a TV anime series produced by MAPPA. The story follows a young devil hunter named Denji who makes a contract with Chainsaw Devil and is reincarnated as “Chainsaw Man.” The anime has received a lot of attention and positive feedback since its release. This time, we have collaborated with collage artist Kosuke Kawamura to recreate the world of the series in a bond and meticulous way. Enjoy this special collection that brings the world of Chainsaw Man to life.

Kosuke Kawamura
Kawamura was born in Hiroshima in 1979. His work as a collage artist has led to a variety of creative projects, from solo exhibitions around the world to corporate collaborations. He became the Creative Director of UT in 2022.

©Tatsuki Fujimoto/SHUEISHA, MAPPA
©Kosuke Kawamura
